meanings.definition: A type of bird known for its loud call.
meanings.sent1: The guacos chirped loudly in the morning, waking up everyone in the village.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of guacos flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The guacos decided to have a singing competition to see who could be the loudest.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a guacos, piercing through the silence of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The colorful feathers of the guacos made it stand out among the other birds.

meanings.definition: A type of tree native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The guacos tree provided shade for the animals in the hot jungle.
meanings.sent2: The guacos tree's leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys loved to swing from the branches of the guacos tree.
meanings.sent4: The guacos tree stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The fruits of the guacos tree were a favorite snack for the local birds.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional dance in some Latin American countries.
meanings.sent1: The guacos dance was full of energy and vibrant music.
meanings.sent2: The dancers moved gracefully to the rhythm of the guacos.
meanings.sent3: Everyone laughed when Juan tripped during the guacos dance.
meanings.sent4: The guacos dance was a celebration of culture and community.
meanings.sent5: The colorful costumes added to the festive atmosphere of the guacos dance.
